document_data.caption: ''The super-continent of Merrouroboros.''
document_data.name: Merrouroboros
document_data.mainbody: '''Merrouroboros''' was a super-continent in existence on the planet [[Abeir-Toril]] during the [[Days of Thunder]] and before the [[Tearfall|Sundering]] of [[Abeir]] from [[Toril]].
document_data.Geography: Merrouroboros was bordered on the west by the [[Silver Sea]] and on the south by the [[Great Blue]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The land of Merrouroboros was inhabited by the legendary [[creator races]] and the early [[jotunbrud]] and [[human]] tribes.
document_data.History:
After the creation of the planet Abeir-Toril, that world had a great Ice Age, which ended in approximately {{Yearlink|-35000}}. At this time, the continent of [[Faer没n]] did not yet exist; instead, Faer没n was joined with [[Kara-Tur]], [[Maztica]], and [[Zakhara]] as part of Merrouroboros.

The [[sarrukh]] were the first to establish an empire on Merrouroboros,<ref group="note">The name Merrouroboros seems derived from the name of the sarrukh's primary god, [[World Serpent|Ourobros the World Serpent]]. ruling over most of the land that would later be Faer没n. Third came the [[batrachi]] empires, coming to prominence some 500 years later and peaking around {{Yearlink|-31500}}. Lastly, the [[aearee]] empires emerged.

Merrouroboros ceased to exist around {{Yearlink|-17600}} in the great cataclysm known as the [[First Sundering]], which caused the super-continent to break apart into [[Faer没n]], [[Maztica]], and [[Katashaka]], and the appearance of [[Evermeet]].<ref>
